name: sequelize-templates
description: Automatically generate templates from your database schema.

scripts.cover: rm -rf coverage && COVERAGE=true ./node_modules/.bin/nyc -r lcov npm run test
scripts.cover-mysql: DIALECT=mysql npm run cover && mv coverage coverage-mysql
scripts.cover-sqlite: DIALECT=sqlite npm run cover && mv coverage coverage-sqlite
scripts.cover-postgres: DIALECT=postgres npm run cover && mv coverage coverage-postgres
scripts.cover-postgres-native: DIALECT=postgres-native npm run cover && mv coverage coverage-postgres-native
scripts.cover-all: npm run cover-mysql && npm run cover-postgres && npm run cover-postgres-native && npm run cover-sqlite && npm run merge-coverage
scripts.codeclimate: npm run cover-all && npm run codeclimate-send && npm run clean-coverage
